title: Brannstasjonen
overview: It is a year since the TV series "Fire Station" rolled over the TV screen last time, then on TV3. The documentary that is now premiere goes on another channel and in a slightly different concept. Last round, it was filmed only Stavanger Fire Station that was in the series, while television teams have been following everyday life at several fire stations around Norway. The "Fire Station" will cover more than 48 episodes and have been filmed at the fire stations in Stavanger, Drammen, Fredrikstad and Sandefjord over a period of three months in the autumn of 2016. In this documentary, viewers get an insight into the working days of the fire service. Without hesitation, the fire brigades dare to help people in need. The series documents life in a risky and vital profession, following both the dramatic expressions that every second counts.
